name: tensorflow-text
summary: TF.Text is a TensorFlow library of text related ops, modules, and subgraphs.

chunks.text:
TF.Text is a TensorFlow library of text related ops, modules, and subgraphs. The
library can perform the preprocessing regularly required by text-based models,
and includes other features useful for sequence modeling not provided by core
TensorFlow.

See the README on GitHub for further documentation.

usage_description:
Here is a 2-sentence summary:

This library is used to enable developers to easily incorporate text-related functionality into their TensorFlow projects, including common preprocessing tasks required for text-based models. With TF.Text, developers can leverage additional features and ops not provided by core TensorFlow, streamlining the development of sequence modeling applications.
